label: Dormition of the Virgin Mary B

work_wit.alt_title: Dormition of the Virgin Mary B

note.value: Both folios (4r, 4v, 5r, 5v) belong clearly to the Dormition of the Holy Virgin, but they cannot be further assigned at present, because of the fragmentary transmission of this text in the other language witnesses. It seems, however, that this passage belongs to the first part with Mary going to the Mount of Olives after the relevation by Jesus Christ. This is the third independent Christian Palestinian Aramaic version of the Dormition of the Holy Virgin (CP3)
